movie_title: Test Our PC Game – Star Birds Demo Out Now!
introduction:
✨ The free demo is live now on Steam: http://kgs.link/starbirds ✨
Play today and help us shape the g
lead_intro: Explore the vastness of space and help interstellar birds thrive in Starbirds, a base building game. Dive into the demo available on Steam and embark on an exciting journey into the unknown!

quiz.question: Where can players access the live demo of Starbirds?
quiz.explanation: Players can access the live demo of Starbirds on Steam.

quiz.question: What is the main objective in Starbirds?
quiz.explanation: The main objective in Starbirds is to help interstellar birds explore and mine countless asteroids to build thriving production networks.

quiz.question: What kind of game is Starbirds?
quiz.explanation: Starbirds is a relaxing base building game set in space, where players help a flock of brave interstellar birds explore and mine asteroids.

quiz.question: How can players provide feedback to improve Starbirds?
quiz.explanation: Players can provide feedback to improve Starbirds through online platforms like Steam, helping make the game even better for the early access launch.

quiz.question: What is the ultimate goal for players in Starbirds?
quiz.explanation: In Starbirds, the ultimate goal for players is to travel to distant star systems and advance further into space than anyone before.
